Home » 40P16 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
77 Sanidassanattika, Upādānadukādi
Sanidassanattika, Upādānadukādi
126.
304Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ upādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho noupādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
305Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi…pe…  avigate cha.
127.
306Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
307Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi…pe…  avigate cha.
